0x9EEFD670F10656D7.name: _GET_WEAPON_HASH_FROM_DEFAULT_PED_WEAPON_COLLECTION
0x9EEFD670F10656D7.comment: this native gets the weapon hash from the default ped weapon collection (see GetDefaultPedWeaponCollection for more info) will randomly return one of it's weapons

examples.code:
local pedWeaponCollectionHash = GetDefaultPedWeaponCollection(joaat("mp_u_m_m_interrogator_01"))
local hash = Citizen.InvokeNative(0x9EEFD670F10656D7, pedWeaponCollectionHash, joaat("GROUP_REVOLVER"))
if hash and IsWeaponValid(hash) then
local name = GetWeaponName(hash)
local label = GetLabelText_2(name)
print(name, label)
end
